description:
Transact is the leader in innovative payment, mobile credential, and commerce solutions for a connected campus. Our mission is to create compelling technology that uniquely simplifies campus operations and makes a meaningful difference in students’ lives. With a highly configurable, mobile-centric campus technology ecosystem, we partner with over 1,750 higher education institutions to simplify the student experience across the full spectrum of student life.

To learn more about our products, please visit our website located here:

Transact | One Connected Experience (transactcampus.com)

We are currently searching for qualified candidates for Senior Manager, Strategic Partnerships - Dining Service Providers. Please see the details for the position below.

Title: Senior Manager, Strategic Partnerships - Dining Service Providers

Location: Remote within the US.

Key Responsibilities: This role is within the Strategic Alliances (Business Development) organization. The team is responsible for sourcing new strategic partners, negotiating commercial terms and legal agreements, operationalizing strategic partnerships across the enterprise, innovating on new opportunities, and coordinating resources to execute on jointly agreed opportunities. This role will specifically focus on bringing cross-functional value to our important Dining Service Provider channel partners to provide them senior level strategic and operational support, while aligning with Sales to drive revenue.

Must Have Experience:
• Bachelor’s degree.
• 5+ years combined experience in Sales, Relationship Management, Strategy, or Alliances roles.
• Ability to analyze large data sets and summarize key trends, develop hypotheses based on trend analysis.
• Be able to work flexible hours due to varying time zones and travel needs.
• Experience gathering “voice of the partner customer” and translating into product feature requirements.
• Ability to set the vision, strategy, and define success metrics related to our DSP partners.

Preferred Experience:
• Prior experience with Dining (Food) Service Providers.
• Closed loop card/ credential transaction systems.
• Higher education technology all a plus.

This job description is not designed to contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties, or responsibilities that are required. Nothing in this job description restricts management's right to assign or reassign duties and responsibilities at any time.

If you are a full-time salaried or hourly worker, we offer the following benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision, Life Insurance, Matched 401(k), Wellness Program, Short-and Long-Term Disability, Charitable Contribution Match, Holidays, Personal Days & Vacation, Paid Volunteer Time Off, and more.

Base salary offers for this position may vary based on factors such as location, skills, and relevant experience. Some positions may include additional compensation in the form of bonus, equity, or commissions.

Transact Campus Inc. is an equal employment opportunity employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, gender, age, color, religion, national origin, marital status, disability, sexual orientation, protected military/veteran status, or any other protected factor.

For more information on other job opportunities and our amazing culture, check us out at transactcampus.com.

If you have questions or need assistance, please contact us at careers@transactcampus.com.
